text:
<@UDB26738Q> on this topic: <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/33976#issuecomment-817155943>

Is it possible to register/update a package on the general registry with a non-registered dependency? If yes, do you have a package ref which does this so I can take a look at it?

elements.text: Is it possible to register/update a package on the general registry with a non-registered dependency? If yes, do you have a package ref which does this so I can take a look at it?

text:
> Is it possible to register/update a package on the general registry with a non-registered dependency?
no

elements.text: Is it possible to register/update a package on the general registry with a non-registered dependency?

text: I guess that makes sense — it would turn into a dependency hell
